GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up an object representing the article whose article_id is in the endpoint, including a comment count equal to a sum of all the comments for that article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves up an array representing the comments whose article_id is in the endpoint

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: accepts an object containing username and body properties, inserts a new comment into the db with these properties and responds with the newly created comment

PATCH /api/articles/article_id.description: accepts an object containing expected vote increment and responds with updated article with updated votes property

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the specified team and sends no body back

GET /api/users.description: responds with an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: responds with an object representing user whose id is in the endpoint

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the votes on the comment whose comment_id is in the endpoint with inc_votes in request object

updatedComment.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
updatedComment.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles.description: inserts a new article with existing topic and author into the db and responds with the newly created article with correct properties

POST /api/topics.description: inserts a new topic and responds with the newly created topic with correct properties
